about_the_game:
Key Features


  • Nonlinear story with two main characters
  • Several endings
  • Choice of romantic interest
  • Time travel game mechanic
  • Riddles, mysteries, supernatural

The Story


Captain Paul, his loyal friend Rickard, mysterious Korina fon Eisenwald... Cursed monastery of Shemergard has captured many in its trap. But who can escape it and overcome the dark magic of its mysterious Overlord and his unspeakable minions?

"With good intentions" is a nonlinear visual novel with two main characters. Unravel the mysteries of Shemergard together with Paul and his friends (and maybe not only friends). Save the abbey together with Rayon fon Eigo who had learned how to cheat his death. Define your way yourself. What will Paul? What will the final fate of other characters be? You decide.

Find out why the master died and resurrected over and over. Walk this path together with him and Paul. Survive in the endless abbey corridors and defeat the monsters who live there.

Reveal the secret of the immortal ruler of Shemergard

"Look, something is wrong here…"
What is it?"
"The silence." No sound of cattle or birds – what kind of a monastery is that? And no sound of people.  

After a wistful shiver, Richard added:

"This doesn't bode well."

Die. Rise. Find a way out.

The main characters


The main heroes will have to endure whatever trials they encounter within the walls of Shemergard. But if Paul facing death has no room for mistake, fate treated Rayon much more favourably.

The Master is destined to partake in the key events of this ill-fated siege of the abbey over and over again: to seek the missing information, walk off established paths to find new ones... And die. But death is followed by an awakening and another chance.

Rayon remembers every defeat and uses this knowledge to win. Killed by a murderer's knife? Take a company of loyal knights! And hope that heathens will not venture into the monastery while they are away.

The finest of knights


See the sombre splendor of Shemergard and its everpresent tenants in all the glory!

The highly detailed characters will play their drama backed by colourful decorations and original visual effects.

Time and dark magic have taken its toll on the abbey's walls, and the heroes will see the difference with their on eyes.

The bond of times have broken


The story of the visual novella is taking place in two epochs. It could seem that they are connected only in the main character's visions. But every step inside the infamous abbey will bring the player closer to revealing of the Shemergard's secret which is hidden in both worlds.

Rules of the Genre


From horror and thriller to epic adventures and detective - "With Good Intentions" goes beyond the standard storyline limits. The story told in different genres proves to be interesting and intriguing.

Love flourishes at the battle field


The heroes are surrounded by their compadres ready to provide their support in the most difficult situations. Where will their adventures lead to: to enmity, friendship or something bigger?

short_description: "With good intentions" is a nonlinear visual novel. Escape from a cursed monastery, win over its mighty Overlord, save your love and uncover the mysteries of time itself!
